changeSet.author: tivanov.anton

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from public.scrum_rss_channel where is_parent is true and parent_id is null

changeSet.sql: insert into public.scrum_rss_channel (link_to_resource, description, is_parent, category) values ('https://www.adme.ru/', 'AdMe', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'HOBBY')), ('https://arzamas.academy/', 'Arzamas', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'EDU')), ('https://www.bbc.com/', 'BBC', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'ALL')), ('https://www.apple.com/', 'Apple', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'TECH')), ('https://knife.media/', 'НОЖ', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'ALL')), ('https://www.dailystar.co.uk', 'Daily Star', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'NEWS')), ('https://www.dw.com/ru/', 'Deutsche Welle', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'NEWS')), ('https://www.foxnews.com/', 'FOXNews.com', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'NEWS')), ('http://georgiatimes.info/', 'GeorgiaTimes Психология', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'PSY')), ('https://postnauka.ru/', 'Постнаука', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'EDU')), ('https://lenta.ru/', 'Lenta.ru', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'NEWS')), ('https://life.ru/', 'Life.ru', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'NEWS')), ('https://lifehacker.ru/', 'Lifehacker.ru', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'ALL')), ('https://meduza.io/', 'Meduza', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'NEWS')), ('https://nplus1.ru/', 'N+1', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'EDU')), ('https://www.currenttime.tv/', 'Настоящее время', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'NEWS')), ('https://newochem.io/', 'Newочём - авторские переводы зарубежных изданий', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'ALL')), ('https://www.labirint.ru/', 'Лабиринт. Книжный магазин', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'BOOKS')), ('https://ideanomics.ru/', 'Идеономика', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'EDU')), ('https://disgustingmen.com/', 'DISGUSTING MEN Отвратительные мужики', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'ALL')), ('https://diletant.media/', 'Дилетант', true, (select id from scrum_rss_category where code = 'ALL'));

changeSet.author: tivanov.anton

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from public.scrum_rss_channel where is_parent is false and parent_id is null
